comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Mr. Pomerene is probably U.S. Senator from Ohio Atlee Pomerene, though he's missing his beard in this photo. His companion is William Cox Redfield, who was the first U.S. Secretary of Commerce.

comment.author: 38098863@N05
comment._content: This a picture of two men shaking hands from what appears to me a government building, perhaps a courthouse.
